Menace
[i]Daunt[/i] – Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays 1 life for each creature attacking you.
[i]Runesword[/i] – Pay 2 life: Bertram gets +1/+1 and gains flanking until end of turn. [i](Whenever a creature without flanking blocks this creature, the blocking creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.)[/i]
